item.title: 英格兰银行官员称需要裁员来修正预测
item.description: 负责英格兰银行现代化工作的官员表示，英格兰银行需要裁员，以改进预测，并加大对过时的技术基础设施的投资。【原文：The Bank of England needs to cut jobs in order to improve its forecasts and ramp up investment in outdated technology infrastructure, according to the official in charge of its modernization efforts.】

item.title: 纽约市拥堵费使收费区污染减少 22
item.description: 康奈尔大学的一项分析显示，在驾车者开始支付新的通行费后，曼哈顿部分地区的污染在今年上半年下降了 22%。【原文：Pollution in parts of Manhattan declined by 22% in the first six months of this year after motorists began paying a new toll to drive south of 60th Street, according to a Cornell University analysis.】

item.title: 摩根大通押注波士顿，计划在新大厦上印上摩根大通的名字
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）计划将其波士顿办事处迁至新的南站大厦（South Station Tower），并加入在这座城市的天际线上留下自己名字的稀有公司行列。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. plans to move its Boston offices to the new South Station Tower — and join the rarefied ranks of companies that have stamped their names on the city’s skyline.】

item.title: 就业数据引发国债反弹停滞 拍卖在即
item.description: 国债走低，此前一项美国职位空缺指数高于预期，这凸显了美联储决策者在准备就本周是否再次降息进行投票时所面临的挑战。【原文：Treasuries edged lower after a gauge of US job openings topped estimates, highlighting the challenge Federal Reserve policymakers face as they prepare to vote on whether to lower interest rates again this week.】

item.title: 乌克兰就债券互换条款与认股权证持有人达成协议
item.description: 乌克兰和一批投资者就该国提出的将其与国内生产总值挂钩的证券换成新一类债券的建议达成了协议，从而结束了数月来有关该证券的谈判。【原文：Ukraine and a group of investors have reached an agreement on the country’s proposal to swap its GDP-linked securities into a new class of bonds, concluding months of negotiations over the securities.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长帕内塔认为美元不再是全球主要货币
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员法比奥-帕内塔表示，国际货币体系很可能会从美元转向由几种共存的全球货币组成的星座。【原文：The international monetary system will likely move away from the dollar to a constellation of several coexisting global currencies, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Fabio Panetta.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮正在吞噬一切
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 巴西市场低迷，政治动荡打击对冲基金交易
item.description: 随着巴西市场月复一月地反弹，全球投资者不断涌入，其涨幅之大足以掩盖离总统选举还有近一年时间的风险。【原文：As Brazil’s markets rallied, month after month, and global investors kept flooding in, the gains were big enough to overshadow the risks from a presidential election that’s still almost a year away.】

item.title: 波音公司 777X 订购热潮扩大对空客的领先优势
item.description: 波音公司在 11 月份获得了 164 架飞机的订单，其中近一半是大型 777X 喷气式客机，从而扩大了其在销售额上对欧洲竞争对手空中客车公司的领先优势。【原文：Boeing Co. booked 164 gross airplane orders in November, with almost half of those for the hulking 777X jetliners, to extend its sales lead over reeling European rival Airbus SE.】

item.title: 英国央行预计英国预算案将把通胀率降低半个百分点
item.description: 英格兰银行预计英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）的预算案将使英国明年春季的通胀率降低多达半个百分点，即使政府在未来几年增加支出也是如此。【原文：The Bank of England expects Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ budget to reduce UK inflation by as much as half a percentage point next spring, even as the government boost spending over the coming years.】

item.title: 交易商押注利率下调，现货白银突破 60 美元纪录
item.description: 白银反弹至每盎司 60 美元以上的新纪录，因为交易商押注美联储将进一步放宽货币政策和供应持续紧张。【原文：Silver rallied to a fresh record above $60 an ounce, as traders bet further monetary easing by the Federal Reserve and continued supply tightness.】

item.title: 全球最大的航空餐饮公司 Gategroup 据称已为首次公开募股做好准备
item.description: 据知情人士透露，全球最大的机上餐饮公司 Gategroup Holding AG 正准备在明年下半年进行首次公开募股。【原文：The world’s biggest in-flight caterer Gategroup Holding AG is preparing for an initial public offering as soon as the second half of next year, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 汇丰退出海湾地区促使该行从英国引入交易员
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）已将几位董事总经理从伦敦调往中东，以补充其在该地区的人员，该地区被指定为首席执行官乔治-埃尔德里（Georges Elhedery）的工作重点。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc has relocated several managing directors from London to the Middle East, replenishing its ranks in a region earmarked as a priority under Chief Executive Officer Georges Elhedery.】

item.title: 哈塞特称美联储现在有空间削减超过 25 个基点的货币
item.description: 白宫国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）表示，他认为大幅下调美联储基准利率的空间很大。【原文：White House National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett said he sees plenty of room to substantially lower the Federal Reserve’s benchmark interest rate.】

item.title: 加密货币的流动性引擎随着 50 亿美元 ETF 的出逃而崩溃
item.description: 比特币正努力将近期的好消息转化为实质性的反弹，这凸显了数字资产市场的持续疲软和流动性稀缺，这在抑制价格方面起到了一定的作用。【原文：Bitcoin is struggling to turn recent good news into a substantive rebound, highlighting the ongoing weakness and thin liquidity in digital asset markets that have played a role in keeping prices subdued.】

item.title: CyrusOne 筹划与欧洲数据中心相关的 6 亿欧元债务
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，数据中心运营商 CyrusOne 正在考虑出售与其欧洲数据中心相关的约 6 亿欧元（约合 6.97 亿美元）债务。【原文：Data center operator CyrusOne is considering selling about €600 million ($697 million) of debt tied to its European data centers, according to people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: Cerberus 支持的德国贷款机构 HCOB 探讨出售事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，汉堡商业银行股份公司（Hamburg Commercial Bank AG）正在探索包括潜在出售在内的各种选择，这家前国有银行现在得到了包括 Cerberus Capital Management 在内的投资公司的支持。【原文：Hamburg Commercial Bank AG, the former state-owner lender now backed by investment firms including Cerberus Capital Management, is exploring options including a potential sale, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国职位空缺增至五个月高点，但裁员人数也在攀升
item.description: 美国 10 月份的职位空缺回升至五个月来的最高水平，但招聘人数减少，裁员人数增加，表明劳动力市场持续放缓。【原文：US job openings picked up in October to the highest level in five months, though less hiring and more layoffs pointed to a continued slowdown in the labor market.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰承诺为 Point 的房屋净值交易出资 25 亿美元
item.description: 蓝猫资本（Blue Owl Capital）向住房融资公司 Point 投资了 25 亿美元，这表明机构投资者开始采用非传统方式为美国房主提供资金支持。【原文：Blue Owl Capital committed $2.5 billion to housing financing company Point, as institutional investors embrace non-traditional approaches to bankrolling US homeowners.】

item.title: 富国银行首席执行官认为人工智能将影响公司的劳动力决策
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.首席执行官查理-沙尔夫（Charlie Scharf）表示，人工智能为提高效率带来了重大机遇，并有可能影响公司的裁员决策。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. Chief Executive Officer Charlie Scharf said artificial intelligence poses a significant opportunity to improve efficiencies and has the potential to influence companies’ headcount decisions.】

item.title: 美联储和甲骨文公布前交易员保持观望，标普 500 指数震荡下行
item.description: 周二上午，美国股市摇摆不定，投资者在等待美联储和人工智能风向标提供的线索，究竟是做多还是套现以迎接2026年的到来。【原文：US equities wavered Tuesday morning as investors waited for clues from the Federal Reserve and artificial intelligence bellwethers about whether to go long or cash out heading into 2026.】

item.title: Cantor Equity 合并后，比特币公司 Twenty One 下跌 25
item.description: Twenty One Capital Inc.与特殊目的收购公司Cantor Equity Partners Inc.合并，成为最新一家上市的加密货币公司，该公司周二首次交易下跌了25%。【原文：Twenty One Capital Inc. fell 25% in its trading debut Tuesday, after it merged with special-purpose acquisition company Cantor Equity Partners Inc. to become the latest public crypto company.】

item.title: 南苏丹称石油仍在流向被叛军夺取的设施
item.description: 南苏丹表示，即使在周一叛军占领了对其原油出口至关重要的邻国苏丹的生产中心后，南苏丹仍在向该设施输送石油。【原文：South Sudan said it was still pumping oil to facilities in neighboring Sudan crucial to its crude exports, even after rebels captured the production hub on Monday.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 的加尔佩林："真正的力量在于选择何时让位"。
item.description:
阿根廷首富即将卸任电子商务巨头首席执行官一职，但他对企业仍有很多想法。【原文：

El hombre más rico de Argentina dejará el cargo de director general del gigante del comercio electrónico, pero aún tiene muchas ideas para el negocio.

】

item.title: 年末资金紧张促使市场呼吁美联储购买商品
item.description: 分析人士称，随着年底的临近，华尔街银行正准备应对货币市场压力的上升，这可能会促使美联储权衡采取措施，重建这个 12.6 万亿美元市场的流动性缓冲。【原文：Wall Street banks are bracing for money market pressures to rise as the year end is approaching, which analysts say may prompt the Federal Reserve to weigh steps to rebuild liquidity buffers in the $12.6 trillion market.】

item.title: 红杉领投的融资使人工智能初创公司 Fal 的估值达到 45 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，人工智能初创公司 Fal 从投资者那里获得了新一轮融资，公司估值达 45 亿美元，是几个月前的三倍。【原文：Artificial Intelligence startup Fal raised fresh funding from investors in a deal that values the company at $4.5 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter — triple its valuation from a few months earlier.】

item.title: 银行家在 2026 年之前以 "压倒性 "速度准备美国 IPO
item.description: 据交易商称，美国首次公开募股市场的幕后活动正进入白热化阶段，受到股市接近历史最高点诱惑的公司正准备上市。【原文：Behind the scenes activity in the US IPO market is reaching a fever pitch, according to dealmakers, as companies lured by stock markets near record highs prepare to go public.】

item.title: 米莱降低阿根廷大豆、玉米和小麦出口税
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统的政府降低了大豆、玉米和小麦的出口关税，以兑现他一再作出的取消征税的承诺。【原文：President Javier Milei’s government reduced tariffs on exports of soybeans, corn and wheat as he seeks to make good on a repeated promise to do away with the levies, which have held back Argentina’s farmers for years.】

item.title: 预算监督机构后悔称加拿大财政状况 "令人震惊
item.description: 加拿大预算监督机构收回了对马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）财政政策最尖锐的批评，但表示政府决定放弃债务与国内生产总值（GDP）之比的准则是一个重大转变，值得进行更多的公开辩论。【原文：Canada’s budget watchdog is walking back his most charged criticisms of Mark Carney‘s fiscal policy, but says the government’s decision to drop its debt-to-GDP guideline is a major shift that warrants more public debate.】

item.title: 肯尼亚因通胀疲软将关键利率降至三年低点
item.description: 肯尼亚中央银行将基准利率下调至近三年来的最低水平，以刺激经济增长，因为预计通货膨胀将保持良好态势。【原文：Kenya’s central bank cut its benchmark interest rate to the lowest level in almost three years to stimulate economic growth as inflation is expected to remain benign.】
